Text:
Proper DVDRip and a fast download...
A/9
V/9
Plot: A Taliban member who lives in Afghanistan is taken captive by the Americans after killing three American soldiers. He is transferred to Europe for interrogation but manages to escape from his captors and becomes an escaped convict on a continent he does not know.
Many Thanx to TvTeam and JBS for a Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
